story_arceus_02_06000/2401_1001_0300_10: Is Red really training in a place like this?
story_arceus_02_06000/2401_1001_0400_10: Yes. I confirmed it through reliable sources.
story_arceus_02_06000/2401_1001_0500_10:
They said the living legend has been training
around this area.
story_arceus_02_06000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Is that so? I’ve always heard he’s rare to come
across and hard to pin down.
story_arceus_02_06000/2401_1001_0700_10: It’s hard to imagine Red would stay in one place.
story_arceus_02_06000/2401_1001_0900_10: Mr. Rose! It’s coming from over there!
story_arceus_02_06000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Three-on-one training? He must be giving them
an advantage.
story_arceus_02_06000/2401_1001_1200_10: From the look of it, though...
story_arceus_02_06000/2401_1001_1300_10:
The three sync pairs he’s up against are also
talented Trainers.
story_arceus_02_06000/2401_1001_1700_10:
Here’s a question for you all. Does he always
train like that?
story_arceus_02_06000/2401_1001_1800_10:
Red’s always doing tons of intense training,
so that’s nothing new.
story_arceus_02_06000/2401_1001_1900_10: But this time, he seemed a little different.
story_arceus_02_06000/2401_1001_2100_10: He called us all up right after his battle with Leon.
story_arceus_02_06000/2401_1001_2200_10:
When we went to see him, he asked us to train
with him. He looked even more serious than usual.
story_arceus_02_06000/2401_1001_2300_10:
He seemed a little on edge, as if he felt he
needed to do better.
story_arceus_02_06000/2401_1001_2400_10: And even now, it’s the same.
story_arceus_02_06000/2401_1001_2500_10:
I hear he asked a lot of other folks to train with
him, too—not just us.
story_arceus_02_06000/2401_1001_2600_10:
He’s been battling nonstop, even cutting back
on sleep!
story_arceus_02_06000/2401_1001_2700_10:
Maybe his battle with Leon sparked something
in him.
story_arceus_02_06000/2401_1001_2900_10: (The way he’s standing with his back to us...)
story_arceus_02_06000/2401_1001_3100_10: I think I understand what Blue was saying now.
story_arceus_02_06000/2401_1001_3300_10: He said Red and Leon are alike!
story_arceus_02_06000/2401_1001_3600_10:
(Even though he beat Leon, he’s not getting
comfortable.)
story_arceus_02_06000/2401_1001_3700_10:
(It’s incredible he still feels that sense of urgency
and is looking for ways to improve.)
story_arceus_02_06000/2401_1001_3800_10:
(Will Red keep his lead? Or will Leon catch up and
surpass him? It’s hard to tell!)
story_arceus_02_06000/2401_1001_3900_10:
Chairman Rose. Perhaps you should mention
your offer.
story_arceus_02_06000/2401_1001_4100_10: Red! Do you have a moment?
story_arceus_02_06000/2401_1001_4500_10: I’m sure the next battle will be the best yet!
